title: Asset Tracker v2 P-GPS request
description: Describes the format which is used by the device to request P-GPS data.

count.description: The number of predictions requested. Default is 42 (7 days, 6 predictions per day)

interval.description: The time between predictions (in minutes). Defaults to 240 (4 hours). Valid values are: 120,240,360,480

day.description: The start day of the prediction set as GPS Day (days since the GPS epoch). Defaults to current GPS day.

time.description: The start time of the prediction set as seconds in day. Defaults to 0. Valid range 0..86399
